reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fabulous in quality, with one mentioning it's perfect for work with a cute cardigan or blazer. The dress is comfortable and flattering, accentuating the waist, and one customer notes it's better than typical cotton summer clothes. The color options receive positive feedback, particularly the true navy blue, and customers appreciate the fit, with one noting it hits perfectly mid-calf. The material weight receives mixed reviews - while some find it the perfect weight, others say it's heavier than expected. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable, but dressy.
items.body: This dress looks dressy but not fussy. Itâ€™s soft and very comfortable. It would be good for dinners out, office wear, etc. No wrinkles, figure flattering, not tight. The medium blue color goes well with light or dark accessories. Iâ€™m very happy with this purchase. Great value. Read more
items.author: Miramar Grandmother

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can be dressed up or down!
items.body: Gorgeous dress! I bought this in navy for an evening event and it looked great with heels. I wore it again with a blazer and flats to a work event, and I received multiple compliments. It's not a perfect fit for my short height, as the waist hits in a slightly weird spot, but it was so comfy and flattering that I decided to keep it. It also hits a bit long, right above my ankles, so it's too long to be tea length. I might get it hemmed. For reference, I'm 5'1", 155lbs, curvy, and I ordered a Medium. Read more
items.author: Faith H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great color, fit & value
items.body: Great dress. The color is very trendy right now and the fit is perfect. Have worn it to work with a jacket and heels and out with boots and a shawl. Nice material and fit for the price. Read more
items.author: Renae

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice color, quality material
items.body: My fiancÃ© liked this better than I did. The fabric is thick and the color is vivid, decent quality for the type of dress. I had a dark color so no worries about it being see-through. Stretchy and slightly big on my waist so I might have been able to size down but it wasnâ€™t noticeable enough to make it worth the effort of return/replace. I wanted to layer it with a jacket for an outdoor fall event and I donâ€™t think that worked for my personal style but it is cute on its own for something indoor or slightly warmer. Overall comfy for wearing through a long day. Read more
items.author: Cami

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great dress!
items.body: Purchased this dress initially to wear for my nieces' high school graduation day/events. LOOOOOVE!!! I will looking to purchase more next Spring/Summer season. The weight is great...not too heavy, but feels weighty enough for you not to feel like you're wearing a fast fashion piece. The length, stretch, color, and fit were all great. I'd definitely recommend this dress. It does wrinkle pretty easily - I'd say using a steamer would be your best bet because the bottom gets tricky. I am a size 14, 36DD, 5'10 with my proportions pretty well balanced and I purchased a size Large and it fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Alisha A.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkles will not come out
items.body: For reference: I am 5'3", 155 lbs, 38 D bust. Ordered a size large for the bust room. The dress is made with sweater like material, but not too hot. The quality of the dress is good but the wrinkle lines from when it was folded, packed, and shipped will not come out. I washed the dress hoping to get the wrinkles out of it, but they were still there. I even ironed the dress while it was damp to see if the steam would get the wrinkles out and still wrinkled. I am going to take it to the dry cleaners to see if they can get the wrinkles lines out of it. If not, then it was a waste of time and money. Read more
items.author: Scott Beesler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Perfect fit. The cut and style gives a beautiful shape. The color black is slimming. The sleeveless arms, round neckline and the flowy skirt hem make it look sophisticated. and the knit design around the waist hides the tummy perfectly. The material is soft and feels light. Light enough for hot weather. But not light that it feels cheap. I would say maybe medium weight then. For reference, I'm 5'3, weigh 112 lbs , 60yo and work out regularly. Read more
items.author: James Alba-Duignan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice fit and looks classy on
items.body: Great fit and very flattering! Wore this to a wedding this summer and got many compliments. Runs true to size. Washed well but I didnâ€™t put it in the dryer for concern it might shrink due to the knit fabric. It took a few days to dry but once it did, looked great. I purchase it in 2 other colors. Read more
items.author: L

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Brilliant Blue, Burgundy, Apricot, Rose, Army Green, Black, Camel, Dark Green, Red, Navy, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
